title: HTML attribute: Part
post:
{{Sidebar("web/html/reference/global_attributes")}}

The **`part`** [global attribute](/blog/Web/HTML/Reference/Global_attributes) contains a space-separated list of the part names of the element. Part names allows CSS to select and style specific elements in a shadow tree via the {{CSSxRef("::part")}} pseudo-element.

See the [`exportparts` attribute](/blog/Web/HTML/Reference/Global_attributes/exportparts) for a usage example.
